pages.title: Asterite
pages.text: A fragment of a long dead star. This red gem may look frail, but is in fact very strong.$(p)It should make for a useful material when crafting new equipment.

pages.title: Obtaining Asterite
pages.text: $(item)Asterite Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining Asterite Ore will require a $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 4) or better, and will usually result in a single $(item)Asterite Cluster() which can then be smelted to obtain an $(item)Asterite() gem.

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Asterite can be used to create quite powerful $(thing)tools$() and $(thing)armor$().

pages.title: Stats
pages.text: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 5$(br)Base Durability: 2015$(br)Mining Speed: 10$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 20$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 22$(br)Total Defense: 23$(br)Toughness: 4$(br)Enchantability: 20
